name: Shooty Block 2: A New Style
description: The Hexa-King is once again up to no good, except this time hes... made a-an entire world you can run and jump in? huh. well anyways, play as Shooty Block and go through every level to defeat the Hexa-King! A mysterious being has also helped you on your journey, by scattering secret power-ups in every level! Can you defeat the Hexa-King and save this blocky and brand new world?
